Description

Being the Grim Reaper would be exciting, right? Scythe, slick duds, eternal employment? Well, it's actually pretty boring, unless you count visits to Party City and Chili's. Live through a day as Death as he struggles with his conscience and his overbearing boss, the Prince of Darkness.

Features

  • Text-driven story game that offers tough choices...take a soul or let the poor soul be?
  • Meet a diverse cast of characters across Death's apartment, office, and island getaway.
  • Argue with the Prince of Darkness over your vacation days.
  • Try not to die of boredom! Well, if you could die...you are Death, after all.
